title: Rads Error
body:
Hi guys,

since i installed the new patch i cant open the launcher anymore. When i open it, it says "Rads error: Couldnt connect to the http servers. Please make sure youre connected to the internet."

There are numerous fixes on the internet, but nothing worked so far. Anyone else getting this issue?

Here's what i tried so far: -Running as admin, -dnsflush, -setting my dns to the google ones, -some weird fix that included a windows data (hosts file), rebooting my PC/router

Thanks for reading.

EDIT: Small update guys. It actually fixed itself? It was really late yesterday, so i gave it a go today morning and it worked fine, like nothing ever happened. Sorry that i probably can't contribute to the debate anymore, but please share your experiences as well, thanks!

replies.body: The error message here might be a little confusing, because the issue might actually be with your client not having permission to load properly.  I suggest using the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to make sure that access is allowed.  Hopefully, this will get you fixed up and back in-game!

I'm having the same prob but I think I fix it or least got it to load for patching, I had to go into the files an set the Patcher an the client to "Run this program as administrator I also added it my firewall exceptions too just in case an it seems to be working every time I close it an reopen it now XD

Yeah that was the first thing i did (or generally do when somethings not working the way it should), but sadly this is not working for many people. Still a good headsup, and possible fix for others thanks.
I have tried everything and nothing seems to work! please help!{{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}

Same problem here. I installed the patch about 6 hours ago; opening LoL now always triggers said error. Restarting my pc surprisingly solves the issue until I close the client again, which leads me to think that it has something to do with windows 10 and some of the local files they create while computer is operating.
im having the same issue, i installed the patch yesterday and it worked fine until i tried to open the game just a few minutes ago.

I have the exact same issue. If I uninstall and do a clean install it will boot up and work again, but if I restart my computer then i'll get the RAD error and have to completely reinstall if I want to play.

Surely this is a riot error if none of the fixes arent working?
I am having the same problem, reinstalling helps, but I started an aram game after reinstalling and it stopped loading with bugsplat and now my rads error is back ;-(
So i have this same problem, with my normal internet. But if i try to make a mobile hotspot with my cellphone it works just fine, kinda wierd.
